class.name: Entity
class.brief_description: Represents an [Entity] inside the world. Entities can be players, mobs, chests, or any kind of interactable things.
class.description: Represents an [Entity] inside the world. Entities can be players, mobs, chests, or any kind of interactable things. Entity supports networking. It considers the server to be authoritative. This means that the server does everything, and it tells the client what to do to prevent cheating. Also clients only has access to data that thye actually need. When multiplayer is active lots of function calls use rpcs, when it's not active calls become direct. Running a server in a client while playing is also supported. Functions starting, or having an 's' in them (like cooldown_adds, or equip_applys_item etc) are only called, or meant to be called by serverside code. Functions with a 'c' in them (like cooldown_addc, equip_deapplyc_item etc) are only called, or meant to be called from clientside code. Functions that have a virtual variant starting with an underscore, should be called, they will call the virtual version. They will check if the virtual properly exists, also usually they check if the parameters are valid, so you don't have to do it every time in gdscript. To spawn them your [member ESS.entity_spawner] directly, or a [ESSEntityWorldSpawner2D] or [ESSEntityWorldSpawner3D] implementation. Note that in order for [member ESS.entity_spawner] to be set, you need to create and instance your own [ESSEntitySpawner] implementation. Note that currently saving these directly into your scenes is not well tested and will likely not work. Originally entities used to be inherited from Spatial or Node2D, so they could contain/drive their own models, but eventually on order to support both 2d, and 3d, bodies were separated from them. This unfortunately complicates the setup a bit, but the upsides overweight the downsides, as this way you don't need to create different entities for every model/body you have. Bodies are stored at EntityData->EntitySpeciesData->ModelDatas (SpeciesModelData)->Body When an Entity gets initialized, it will instance it's body automatically, but if you want to do it yourself, you can call [method instance_body] on an Entity. The model_index property tells the Entity which one it should use. Instancing bodies does not happen immediately, but you will probably want to set an Entity's position right where you create it, that's why [method set_transform_2d] and [method set_transform_3d] is available. Your body implementation then can get this from an entity an set itself to the right place. Setting up entity nodes can be done in multiple ways, all have different positives and negatives. The Most useful examples: 1. Making [Entity] the root node of a character's scene, and adding it's body as a child: [code]root (Viewport) - (autoloads, ...) - Main scene (Like a tile map, or a Spatial ...) - Entity1 (Entity) - Body - etc - Entity2 (Entity) - ... - ...[/code] This setup is by far the easiest and simplest. However it has multiple issues. Since [Entity] is just a [Node], [Spatial] and [Node2D] transform hierarchies cannot be used, also thing like [YSort] will not work properly. It also have the issue thay you can't rely on [NodePath]s to an [Entity] if you need to reparent Entities (like moving into caves, etc.). 2. Making an [Entity]'s body the root node, and adding the [Entity] as a child: [code]root (Viewport) - (autoloads, ...) - Main scene (Like a tile map, or a Spatial ...) - Entity1Body (Spatial, Node2D, ...) - Entity1 (Entity) - etc - Entity2Body (Spatial, Node2D ...) - ... - ...[/code] This setup is a bit more complex, and it solves the transform hierarchy issues, however entities still can't be easily reparented (especially when multiplayer is involved), also here changing entity bodies is harder. 3. Making a [Spatial] or [Node2D] the root node, and adding both the [Entity] and it's body as a child: [code]root (Viewport) - (autoloads, ...) - Main scene (Like a tile map, or a Spatial ...) - Entity1Root (Spatial, Node2D, ...) - Entity1 (Entity) - Entity1Body - etc - Entity2Root (Spatial, Node2D ...) - ... - ...[/code] This setup is more complex than the previous ones, but it solves every issue except for being able to easily reparent [Entity] for example in case of a level change. 4. Handling the [Entity] and it's body completely separately. Can be done loits of ways, here's one: [code]root (Viewport) - EntitySpawner - Entity1 (Entity) - ENtity2 (Entity) - ... - (autoloads, ...) - Main scene (Like a tile map, or a Spatial ...) - Entity1Body (Spatial, Node2D, ...) - etc - Entity2Body (Spatial, Node2D ...) - ... - ...[/code] This setup is even more complex than the previous ones, but it solves all previous issues. THis solution can also easily use World overrides for switching between different levels, and will also work without issues when using multiplayer.

method.name: _body_changed
method.description: Called when the current [Entity]'s body changed.

method.name: _body_instance
method.description: Instances a body. Called by [method body_instance].

method.name: _canc_interact
method.description: Check whether the current [Entity] can interact with it's target. Checks on the client side. Can be used to validate whether an interaction can happen before requesting it to a server. Asking the server can be done using [method crequest_interact]. Called by [method canc_interact].

method.name: _cans_interact
method.description: Check whether the current [Entity] can interact with it's target. Checks on the server side. Called by [method cans_interact].

method.name: _character_talent_sreceive_learn_request
method.description: The client (this [Entity]'s owner) requested to learn the given character talent. Called by [method character_talent_sreceive_learn_request].

method.name: _character_talent_sreceive_reset_request
method.description: The client (this [Entity]'s owner) requested to reset it's talents. Called by [method character_talent_sreceive_reset_request].

method.name: _class_talent_sreceive_learn_request
method.description: The client (this [Entity]'s owner) requested to learn the given class talent. Called by [method class_talent_sreceive_learn_request].

method.name: _class_talent_sreceive_reset_request
method.description: The client (this [Entity]'s owner) requested to reset it's talents. Called by [method class_talent_sreceive_reset_request].

method.name: _con_character_talent_learned
method.description: The current entity learned a character talent.

method.name: _con_character_talent_reset
method.description: The current entity got it's character talents reset.

method.name: _con_class_talent_learned
method.description: The current entity learned a class talent.

method.name: _con_class_talent_reset
method.description: The current entity got it's class talents reset.

method.name: _crafts
method.description: Try to craft the recipe with the given id.

method.name: _equip_applyc_item
method.description: Item got equipped. Apply it client side. Could mean changing textures, etc.

method.name: _equip_applys_item
method.description: Item got equipped. Apply it server side. Could mean applying it's stats, etc.

method.name: _equip_can_equip_item
method.description: Check whether the given item can be equipped.

method.name: _equip_deapplyc_item
method.description: Item got de-equipped. Deapply it client side. Could mean changing textures, etc.

method.name: _equip_deapplys_item
method.description: Item got de-equipped. Deapply it server side. Could mean deapplying it's stats, etc.

method.name: _equip_should_deny
method.description: Equipping can be denied if necessary with this.

method.name: _equips
method.description: Try equipping the item at bag slot and equip slot.

method.name: _from_dict
method.description: Load data from a [Dictionary] obtained from [method to_dict]. Called by [method from_dict].

method.name: _getc_relation_to
method.description: Return how this Entity relates to the given Entity.

method.name: _gets_relation_to
method.description: Return how this Entity relates to the given Entity.

method.name: _moved
method.description: Called when the [Entity]'s body is moved.

method.name: _notification_ccategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: _notification_ccategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: _notification_scategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: _notification_scategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: _setup
method.description: Setup. Called by [method setup]. When this is called [EntityData] has already been set.

method.name: _son_character_talent_learned
method.description: Called when a character talent is learned.

method.name: _son_character_talent_reset
method.description: Called when character talents are reset.

method.name: _son_class_talent_learned
method.description: Called when a class talent is learned.

method.name: _son_class_talent_reset
method.description: Called when class talents are reset.

method.name: _to_dict
method.description: Serialize all data to a [Dictionary]. Called by [method to_dict].

method.name: _vendor_item_sbuy
method.description: Try to buy an item from the target.

method.name: _vendor_item_ssell
method.description: Try to learn an spell from the target.

method.name: aura_addc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending an aura data to the client.

method.name: aura_getc
method.description: Get the aura at the given index.

method.name: aura_gets
method.description: Get the aura at the given index.

method.name: aura_gets_by
method.description: Get an aura from the given caster with the given aura_id (spell_id) or null.

method.name: aura_gets_with_group_by
method.description: Get an aura from the given caster with the given aura group or null.

method.name: aura_removec_dispelled_rpc
method.description: RPC call for dispelling aura on the client.

method.name: aura_removec_exact_rpc
method.description: RPC call for removing aura on the client.

method.name: aura_removec_expired_rpc
method.description: RPC call for removing aura on the client when it was expired.

method.name: aura_removec_rpc
method.description: RPC call for removing aura on the client.

method.name: bag_setc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending bag data to client.

method.name: body_get_2d
method.description: Returns the entity's body casted to Node2D.

method.name: body_get_3d
method.description: Returns the entity's body casted to Spatial.

method.name: canc_interact
method.description: Check whether the current [Entity] can interact with it's target. Checks on the client side. Can be used to validate whether an interaction can happen before requesting it to a server. Asking the server can be done using [method crequest_interact]. Calls [method _canc_interact].

method.name: cans_interact
method.description: Check whether the current [Entity] can interact with it's target. Checks on the server side. Calls [method _cans_interact].

method.name: cast_is_castingc
method.description: Returns whether this entity is casting.

method.name: cast_is_castings
method.description: Returns whether this entity is casting.

method.name: cast_spell_successc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending spell cast success data to client.

method.name: cast_startc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending spell cast start data to client.

method.name: category_cooldown_getc
method.description: Returns the current category cooldown for category id.

method.name: category_cooldown_getc_count
method.description: Returns the current active category cooldown count.

method.name: category_cooldown_getc_index
method.description: Returns the current category cooldown for index.

method.name: category_cooldown_gets
method.description: Returns the current category cooldown for category id.

method.name: category_cooldown_gets_count
method.description: Returns the current active category cooldown count.

method.name: category_cooldown_gets_index
method.description: Returns the current category cooldown for index.

method.name: category_cooldown_hasc
method.description: Returns whether there is an active category cooldown for category_id.

method.name: category_cooldown_hass
method.description: Returns whether there is an active category cooldown for category_id.

method.name: cdamage_dealt_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending damage dealt data to client.

method.name: cdealt_damage_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending dealt damage data to client.

method.name: cdealt_heal_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending heal data to client.

method.name: cequip_applys_item
method.description: Called when an item got equipped.

method.name: character_skeleton_get
method.description: Returns the active character skeleton if there are any.

method.name: character_skeleton_set
method.description: Sets the active character skeleton if there are any.

method.name: character_talent_crequest_learn
method.description: Request learning a character talent from the server.

method.name: character_talent_crequest_reset
method.description: Request a character talent reset from the server.

method.name: character_talent_getc
method.description: Get learned character talent at index.

method.name: character_talent_gets
method.description: Get learned character talent at index.

method.name: character_talent_hasc
method.description: Checks whether the given character talent is learned.

method.name: character_talent_hass
method.description: Checks whether the given talent is learned.

method.name: character_talent_sreceive_learn_request
method.description: This is how the server receives a character talent learn request.

method.name: character_talent_sreceive_reset_request
method.description: This is how the server receives a character talent reset request.

method.name: cheal_dealt_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending heal dealt data to client.

method.name: class_talent_crequest_learn
method.description: Request learning a class talent from the server.

method.name: class_talent_crequest_reset
method.description: Request a class talent reset from the server.

method.name: class_talent_hasc
method.description: Checks whether this entity has the given class talent.

method.name: class_talent_hass
method.description: Checks whether this entity has the given class talent.

method.name: class_talent_sreceive_learn_request
method.description: This is how the server receives a class talent learn request.

method.name: class_talent_sreceive_reset_request
method.description: Request a class talent reset from the server.

method.name: cooldown_getc
method.description: Returns the cooldown for spell id.

method.name: cooldown_getc_count
method.description: Returns how many active cooldowns are.

method.name: cooldown_gets
method.description: Returns the cooldown for spell id.

method.name: cooldown_gets_count
method.description: Returns how many active cooldowns are.

method.name: cooldown_hasc
method.description: Returns whether there is a cooldown for spell_id.

method.name: cooldown_hass
method.description: Returns whether there is a cooldown for spell_id.

method.name: copen_window
method.description: Open the window with the given id on the client side.

method.name: craft_addc_recipe_id
method.description: Add craft recipe given it's id.

method.name: craft_adds_recipe_id
method.description: Add craft recipe given it's id.

method.name: craft_getc_recipe
method.description: Return a known craft recipe at index.

method.name: craft_getc_recipe_count
method.description: Return the number of craft recipes known.

method.name: craft_gets_recipe
method.description: Return a known craft recipe at index.

method.name: craft_gets_recipe_count
method.description: Return the number of craft recipes known.

method.name: craft_gets_recipe_id
method.description: Return a known craft recipe given it's id.

method.name: craft_hasc_recipe
method.description: Return whether a craft recipe is already known.

method.name: craft_hasc_recipe_id
method.description: Return whether a craft recipe is already known given it's id.

method.name: craft_hass_recipe
method.description: Return whether a craft recipe is already known.

method.name: craft_hass_recipe_id
method.description: Return whether a craft recipe is already known given it's id.

method.name: craft_removec_recipe_id
method.description: Remove craft recipe given it's id.

method.name: craft_removes_recipe_id
method.description: Remove craft recipe given it's id.

method.name: crequest_interact
method.description: Request interaction with the target from the server.

method.name: data_addc
method.description: Add additional data to be stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_adds
method.description: Add additional data to be stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_getc
method.description: Get additional data stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_getc_count
method.description: Get additional data count that is stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_gets
method.description: Get additional data stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_gets_count
method.description: Get additional data count that is stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_removec
method.description: Remove additional data stored alongside this entity.

method.name: data_removes
method.description: Remove additional data stored alongside this entity.

method.name: equip_applys_item
method.description: Item got equipped. Apply it server side. Could mean applying it's stats, etc. Calls [method _equip_applys_item].

method.name: equip_can_equip_item
method.description: Check whether the given item can be equipped. Calls [method _equip_can_equip_item].

method.name: equip_crequest
method.description: Request equipping an item from the server.

method.name: equip_deapplyc_item
method.description: Item got de-equipped. Deapply it client side. Could mean changing textures, etc. Calls [method _equip_deapplyc_item].

method.name: equip_deapplys_item
method.description: Item got de-equipped. Deapply it server side. Could mean deapplying it's stats, etc. Calls [method _equip_deapplys_item].

method.name: equip_getc_slot
method.description: Get the equipped item from the given slot.

method.name: equip_gets_slot
method.description: Get the equipped item from the given slot.

method.name: equip_should_deny
method.description: Equipping can be denied if necessary with this. Calls [method _equip_should_deny].

method.name: equips
method.description: Try equipping the item at bag slot and equip slot.

method.name: from_dict
method.description: Load data from a [Dictionary] obtained from [method to_dict]. Calls [method _from_dict].

method.name: gcd_hasc
method.description: Returns whether the entity has a global cooldown.

method.name: gcd_hass
method.description: Returns whether the entity has a global cooldown.

method.name: get_action_bar_profile
method.description: Return the active action bar profile.

method.name: get_maunal_process
method.description: Should processing auras, spells, cast etc. happen automatically? Turn based combat can be implemented by setting this to false.

method.name: get_transform_2d
method.description: Return the stored Transform 2D for the body.

method.name: get_transform_3d
method.description: Return the stored Transform for the body.

method.name: getc_health
method.description: Return the Entity's health resource. By default it is [EntityResourceHealth], can be customized in [method _initialize].

method.name: getc_is_controlled
method.description: Is the entity controlled by this client?

method.name: getc_relation_to
method.description: Return how this Entity relates to the given Entity.

method.name: getc_speed
method.description: Return the Entity's health resource. By default it is [EntityResourceSpeed], can be customized in [method _initialize].

method.name: gets_health
method.description: Return the Entity's health resource. By default it is [EntityResourceHealth], can be customized in [method _initialize].

method.name: gets_relation_to
method.description: Return how this Entity relates to the given Entity.

method.name: gets_speed
method.description: Return the Entity's health resource. By default it is [EntityResourceSpeed], can be customized in [method _initialize].

method.name: is_deserialized
method.description: Will be true if the entity was loaded, and not freshly created. Needed for proper initialization.

method.name: item_addc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending an added item's data to the client.

method.name: item_crequest_remove
method.description: Request removing an item from the server.

method.name: item_crequest_swap
method.description: Request swapping an item from the server.

method.name: item_crequest_use
method.description: Request using an item from the server.

method.name: item_removec
method.description: Remove the item from the given slot.

method.name: item_removes
method.description: Remove the item from the given slot.

method.name: loot_crequest
method.description: Request looting the target from the server.

method.name: moved
method.description: Call when the entity's body moved.

method.name: notification_ccategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: notification_ccategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: notification_scategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: notification_scategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: notification_soverburden_removed
method.description: Received when the given bag is overburdened.

method.name: notification_soverburdened
method.description: Received when the given bag's overburden removed.

method.name: notification_target_item_sadded
method.description: Item added to target bag notification.

method.name: notification_target_item_sremoved
method.description: Item removed from target bag notification.

method.name: notification_target_item_sscount_changed
method.description: Item count changed in target bag notification.

method.name: notification_target_items_sswapped
method.description: Items swapped in target bag notification.

method.name: pet_getc_count
method.description: Return how many pets this entity has.

method.name: pet_gets_count
method.description: Return how many pets this entity has.

method.name: register_for_physics_process
method.description: Register SpellCastInfo so it gets physics process notification.

method.name: resource_addc_rpc
method.description: RPC call for sending an added entity resource data to the client.

method.name: resource_getc_count
method.description: Return [EntityResource] count. Includes health, and speed resources aswell.

method.name: resource_gets_count
method.description: Return [EntityResource] count. Includes health, and speed resources aswell.

method.name: sapply_passives_damage_deal
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before dealing damage.

method.name: sapply_passives_damage_receive
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before receiving damage.

method.name: sdeal_damage_to
method.description: Deal damage to target found in [SpellDamageInfo].

method.name: sdeal_heal_to
method.description: Deal heal to target found in [SpellDamageInfo].

method.name: set_maunal_process
method.description: Should processing auras, spells, cast etc. happen automatically? Turn based combat can be implemented by setting this to false.

method.name: set_transform_2d
method.description: Sets the stored Transform 2D for the body.

method.name: set_transform_3d
method.description: Sets the stored Transform 3D for the body.

method.name: skill_hasc
method.description: Check whethet this entity has the given skill.

method.name: skill_hasc_id
method.description: Check whethet this entity has the given skill.

method.name: skill_hass
method.description: Check whethet this entity has the given skill.

method.name: skill_hass_id
method.description: Check whethet this entity has the given skill.
